Hi Ricardo, 

There are also other quite different approaches to evolving 
=
phenotypes with repeating substructures.  They usually involve a 
developme=
nt or "embryogeny" process from genotype to phenotype.  You 
might find our=
 paper, "A Taxonomy on Artificial Embryogeny," to 
present an interesting i=
ntroduction to that way of thinking about 
evolving such structures:

http:=
//nn.cs.utexas.edu/keyword?stanley:alife03

ken
